monsters.name: Drakofido
monsters.condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

traits.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
traits.desc: Incapacitated while in the area of an <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>antimagic field<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>. If targeted by <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Dispel Magic<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, must succeed on a CON saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.desc: While motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal statue.

traits.name: Magical Construct
traits.desc: Immune to diseases and doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Makes two attacks: one bite and one constrict, or 2 slam attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d8 +3 piercing damage plus 1d4 +0 fire damage.

actions.name: Constrict
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 +3 bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the Drakofido can't constrict another target.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d10 +3 bludgeoning damage.
